name: Grand Charisma
description:
Bored at work?
Then grease up them wheelie chair wheels and take a spin around the office for some office themed racing games.
What perks will you win?
Will you make it to the giddy heights of an Executive of Schmoozing Or will you just go back to work?
Come take a spin!

This project is built upon a Challenge from GameDev.TV Challenge Club. Weekly project files are given, which are incomplete. A series of challenges are listed to get them working, and then take it further!
More info can be found here :- https://offer.gamedev.tv/challenge-club/
